LanguageData.ARA_Possession.label: Arachne protozoa
LanguageData.ARA_Possession.description: This creature's body is controlled by the Arachne protozoa.The original owner of this body can no longer return.
LanguageData.ARA_Facehugger_LowOperation.label: Arachne protozoa
LanguageData.ARA_Facehugger_LowOperation.description: Once separated from the host, the Arachneum protozoa is extremely fragile and cannot perform specialized tasks with its small body.
